person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night. I just can't seem to relax.
animal_say: Oh no, sleepless nights are the worst! You should meet Bruno, the bear who helps with relaxation and stress release. Interested?

person_say: Meeting Bruno sounds amazing! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Let's go meet Bruno! He'll help you unwind and find your calm. Off we go!
